org.janusproject.acl

Interface ACLMessageEnvelope

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ACLMessage.Envelope

    public interface ACLMessageEnvelope
    This interface describes the Envelope of a given ACL Message as defined by FIPA.
    Version:
    $FullVersion$
    Author:
    $Author: madeline$, $Author: kleroy$, $Author: ptalagrand$, $Author: ngaud$
    See Also:
    FIPA Agent Message Transport Envelope Representation
